author: cnbc.com
title: Crosslake Hires Veteran IT Strategist to Lead Global Practice
text:
SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Seattle-based Crosslake Technologies announced today that Wayne Filin-Matthews is joining the firm as Global Head of Software Strategy. Filin-Matthews comes to Crosslake from his post as Global Head of Digital Architecture at HSBC Retail Banking and Wealth Management in Hong Kong.
“With over three decades in the IT industry, Wayne has a proven track record transforming businesses by managing and growing enterprise architecture practices in all phases of the IT lifecycle, from strategy and execution to adoption,” said Crosslake founder and CEO Russ Albright .
“I am delighted to join forces with the impressive team at Crosslake Technologies,” said Filin-Matthews . “The work they are doing to help their clients modernize their technologies from high-level strategy to hands-on implementation is unique, challenging and rewarding.”
“I’ve had the pleasure of working with Wayne on several occasions and am thrilled he’s bringing his prodigious talents to Crosslake,” continued Albright . “Wayne will be leading our Global Technology and Strategy team, where he’s charged with helping our clients optimize their software systems to create value in this rapidly changing environment.”
Prior to his tenure at HSBC, Filin-Matthews spent time in senior leadership at Accenture, and nearly a decade at Microsoft where he rose to Director of Business Transformation Programs within the worldwide office of the Chief Technology Officer.
Filin-Matthews attended the Open University, the University of Oxford Said Business School, and Harvard Business School.
About Crosslake Technologies
Founded in 2008, Crosslake helps companies build and run better software. From strategic vision to planning and architecture, development and execution, Crosslake works to transform and optimize software delivery. In addition to our functional skills in software development, Crosslake’s team of senior software professionals provides end-to-end value with expertise in management consulting and advisory services providing both strategic and tactical insight. Crosslake is headquartered in the Seattle suburb of Bellevue, Washington. More information can be found at www.crosslaketech.com . Or follow us on Twitter , LinkedIn and Facebook .
